Name: Hentai Island
About the game: Your name is Kreig and you were the prisoner of an evil king who planned to use your gift to absorb the life energy of all people and bring the entire world under his control. Thanks to a girl, you escaped from his clutches and embarked on a journey with her to a magical island. Your goal is to use the gift you've always considered a curse to make yourself powerful enough to save the world. ⚫︎Explore a beautiful and huge open world full of interesting places. ⚫︎Choose your favorite class and fight against powerful monsters with the help of attractive girls, each with her own abilities. ⚫︎Get to know your partners better, get intimate with them and let love and lust invade you. More girls will be added in future updates. ⚫︎RPG Elements: Level up, manage your skill points however you like, and destroy your enemies with your new powers thanks to your skill tree. ⚫︎Get the magical orbs that will increase your power and enjoy incredible abilities that will allow you to move through the world in a totally different and exciting way.
